item.title: Quick docker container shell alias
item.description: Often we need to run shell commands on a running docker container. The traditional way would be to run docker exec -it <container> /bin/bash for example. Below is an alias to simplify this process a bit.

item.title: Kubernetes impersonations with kubie
item.description: Some Kubernetes resources require elevated privileges to access. For example, passing --as <namespace>-admin to each kubectl command. Below is a convenient alias to elevate your permissions for such resources.
